Code Reference¶

class read.Read¶

class that reads in parameters, which are to be used in the HELIOS code

static delete_duplicates(long_list)¶

delete all duplicates in a list and return new list

read_kappa_table(quant)¶

reads in entropy and kappa (for the stellar community: delad) values from ASCII table

read_opac_file(quant, Vmod)¶

reads the opacity table

read_param_file_and_command_line(quant, Vmod)¶

reads the input file and command line options

read_star(quant)¶

reads the correct stellar spectrum from the corresponding file

read_temperature_file(quant)¶

reads the temperatures from a file

static set_precision(quant)¶

sets the correct precision for floating point numbers

static set_realtime_plotting(var)¶

sets the realtime plotting parameters

class realtime_plotting.Plot¶

class including all the plotting utensils

static plot_convective_feedback(quant)¶

plots the tp profile and the net flux in realtime

static plot_tp(quant)¶

plots the TP-profile in realtime

class clouds.Cloud¶

class that reads in cloud parameters, which then can be used in the HELIOS code

conversion_of_cloud_parameters(quant)¶

converts the cloud parameters to the HELIOS wavelength grid

convert_to_new_grid(int_lambda, cent_lambda, orig_lambda, orig_value)¶

generic function to convert values from one grid to another

main_cloud_method(quant)¶

main method to handle cloud input

static onetoleft(array, limit)¶

small function to find the index of an array element whose value is closest to the left of a given limit

read_cloud_dat(quant)¶

reads the cloud file (courtesy of D. Kitzmann)

read_cloud_h5(quant)¶

reads int the cloud .h5 file

write_cloud_h5(quant)¶

creates a h5 container with the interpolated cloud parameters

GPU-accelerated radiative transfer code for exoplanetary atmospheres
